title: A Telegram Channel with Only NBA Tweets from ESPN Stats and Info
author: assafmo
content: readme.md bot lives @nbaespnstats telegram bot follows twitter account sends tweets match certain keywords a specific chat.usagecreate twitter appcreate telegram botcreate file config.json along side main.js:{ "telegram": { "chat_id": "<your_telegram_chat_id>", "bot_key": "<your_telegram_bot_key>" }, "twitter": { "account_id_to_follow": "get_at http://idfromuser.com/", "consumer_key": "get_at https://apps.twitter.com/app/xxxxxxxx/keys", "consumer_secret": "get_at https://apps.twitter.com/app/xxxxxxxx/keys", "access_token_key": "get_at https://apps.twitter.com/app/xxxxxxxx/keys", "access_token_secret": "get_at https://apps.twitter.com/app/xxxxxxxx/keys" }} your telegram chat_id messaging bot the desired chat checking https://api.telegram.org/bot<your_telegram_bot_key>/getupdates.keyswords in ./keywords folder a .js module.each keyword list is promised array strings.keywords are case-sensitive.blacklist entries in ./keywords_blacklist folder a .js module.each keyword list is promised array objects.each object is the form { is_accepted_because: "hawks",blacklist: "black hawks"}. means if bot find hawks a keyword also black hawks, it won't consider hawks a keyword this tweet.blacklist keywords are case-sensitive.execute node main.jsdebug config_debug.json instead config.jsonexecute node main.js debug
